project.logic

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.logic.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes acyclic directed graph, which represents the task to solve on the computer system.
    Author:
    Yaroslav

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Graph.SortByCriticalTime
      This class comparator sorts list of graph nodes by critical path time.
      static class  Graph.SortByOutgoingGLinks
      This class comparator sorts list of graph nodes by the number of outgoing transitions.

      • checkCycles

        public java.lang.Object[] checkCycles()
        Check graph for cycles. It uses passage of the graph in depth in two directions.
        Returns:
        object array contains 2 elements: - flag whether graph contains cycles or not - cycles information if contains

      • generateQueue

        public void generateQueue(int queueType,
                 boolean printInfo)
        This method is used to generate queues with the specified queue type.
        Parameters:
        queueType - a value of the queue type code (1, 12, 16)
        printInfo - is used to not print info during large random graph generations
